tasks.label: Git Snapshot (to main)
tasks.command: git fetch origin main && git switch main && git pull --ff-only && git add -A && git commit -m "snapshot $(date '+%F %T')" || echo 'geen wijzigingen' ; git push

tasks.label: Cleanup README
tasks.command: cp README.md README.md.bak && awk '/^# Spiegelven-Fakturatie/{count++} count<2' README.md > README.tmp && mv README.tmp README.md && git add README.md && git commit -m "docs: cleanup duplicate README section" && git push
